live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.

57327.summary: Some customers in the South West (Esler) area of Williams Lake are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

57333.summary: Some customers in the Hawkwood area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57333.title: Jan 26 - Calgary (Hawkwood) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Small update to region impacted as Hydro crews continue their work and some of our customers come back online automatically.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
